title: Alone
description: When Serenity reaches the end of her tether, no one can save her. The men in her life to date have all been takers, users, people who suck the life out her and then, somehow, make her feel as if it's her fault. This was Serenity's life until she crosses paths with a mysterious stranger. Sebastian is drawn to Serenity and tries to make her life safer, whilst avoiding his own demon-ridden past.
author: Marissa Farrar
